import { Col, Row } from "react-bootstrap"; import movieDetails from "../models/movieDetails"; type Props = { movieDetails : movieDetails } const ShowMovieDetails = ({movieDetails} : Props) => { return ( <>

{movieDetails.title}

Imdb Rating {movieDetails.imdbRating} Content Rating {movieDetails.contentRating} Average Rating {movieDetails.averageRating} Duration {movieDetails.duration} Genres {movieDetails.genres} Actors {movieDetails.actors} Release Date {movieDetails.releaseDate} Story Line {movieDetails.storyline} ); } export default ShowMovieDetails;
